sentences.sContent: The agreement includes a provision for each side to check the other side’s weapons.
sentences.sCn: 协议有项规定，允许双方互查武器。

sentences.sContent: Under the provisions of the Act, employers must supply safety equipment.
sentences.sCn: 该法令规定，雇主必须提供安全设备。

sentences.sContent: ...public pensions and health-care provision will have to be reined back severely and taxes may have to go up...

synos.tran: 规定；条款；准备；[经]供应品

phrases.pCn: 为…预先采取措施；为…作好准备
补充规定；追加拨款，增补拨款；追加备付款项

remMethod.val: 来自provide(v. 供应， 提供)

words.tran: 附带条件；附文；限制性条款

trans.tranOther: a condition in an agreement or law
